'''"Beware of Remurians..."''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to interrupt the [[Legatus Golem]] by destroying the resonating harp it summons.

==Trivia==
* The achievement references the proverb {{w|beware of Greeks bearing gifts}}. It originated from the {{w|Aeneid}}, written by the Roman poet {{w|Virgil}}, in which the Trojan priest Laocoön expresses his distrust for {{w|Trojan horse|the horse gifted by the Greeks}}, which turns out to actually be a trap.
